name: spotizerr
description: Spotizerr is a self-hosted tool connecting Spotify data with Overseerr-style request workflows, allowing users to request tracks or albums in curated collections.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Provides familiar interface for media requests

features.title: User Permissions
features.description: Controls who can request and approve music

features.title: Download Automation
features.description: Triggers downloads when requests are approved

features.title: Library Integration
features.description: Checks existing library to avoid duplicates

features.title: Approval Workflow
features.description: Requires admin approval before processing requests
